verses.text_plain: And it came to pass in the days of Ahaz the son of Jotham, the son of Uzziah, king of Judah, that Rezin the king of Syria, and Pekah the son of Remaliah, king of Israel, went up toward Jerusalem to war against it, but could not prevail against it.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass in the days of Ahaz the son of Jotham, the son of Uzziah, king of Judah, that Rezin the king of Syria, and Pekah the son of Remaliah, king of Israel, went up toward Jerusalem to war against it, but could not prevail against it.

tokens.text: And it came to pass in the days

verses.text_plain: And it was told the house of David, saying, Syria is confederate with Ephraim. And his heart was moved, and the heart of his people, as the trees of the wood are moved with the wind.
verses.verse_html:
2And it was told the house of David, saying, Syria is confederate with Ephraim. And his heart was moved, and the heart of his people, as the trees of the wood are moved with the wind. ▼
▼ is confederate…: Heb. resteth on

footnotes.body_html: ▼ is confederate…: Heb. resteth on

verses.text_plain: Then said the Lord unto Isaiah, Go forth now to meet Ahaz, thou, and Shear–jashub thy son, at the end of the conduit of the upper pool in the highway of the fuller’s field;
verses.verse_html:
3Then said the Lord unto Isaiah, Go forth now to meet Ahaz, thou, and Shear–jashub thy son, at the end of the conduit of the upper pool in the highway of the fuller’s field; ▼
▼ Shear–jashub: that is, The remnant shall return
 , ▼
▼ highway: or, causeway

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Shear–jashub: that is, The remnant shall return
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Shear–jashub: that is, The remnant shall return

verses.text_plain: And say unto him, Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted for the two tails of these smoking firebrands, for the fierce anger of Rezin with Syria, and of the son of Remaliah.
verses.verse_html:
4And say unto him, Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted for the two tails of these smoking firebrands, for the fierce anger of Rezin with Syria, and of the son of Remaliah. ▼
▼ neither…: Heb. let not thy heart be tender

footnotes.body_text: ▼ neither…: Heb. let not thy heart be tender
footnotes.body_html: ▼ neither…: Heb. let not thy heart be tender

verses.text_plain: Because Syria, Ephraim, and the son of Remaliah, have taken evil counsel against thee, saying,
verses.verse_html: 5Because Syria, Ephraim, and the son of Remaliah, have taken evil counsel against thee, saying,

verses.text_plain: Let us go up against Judah, and vex it, and let us make a breach therein for us, and set a king in the midst of it, even the son of Tabeal:
verses.verse_html:
6Let us go up against Judah, and vex it, and let us make a breach therein for us, and set a king in the midst of it, even the son of Tabeal: ▼
▼ vex: or, waken

tokens.text: it, and let us make a breach

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God, It shall not stand, neither shall it come to pass.
verses.verse_html: 7Thus saith the Lord God, It shall not stand, neither shall it come to pass.

verses.text_plain: For the head of Syria is Damascus, and the head of Damascus is Rezin; and within threescore and five years shall Ephraim be broken, that it be not a people.
verses.verse_html:
8For the head of Syria is Damascus, and the head of Damascus is Rezin; and within threescore and five years shall Ephraim be broken, that it be not a people. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. from a people

tokens.text: that it be not a people

footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. from a people

verses.text_plain: And the head of Ephraim is Samaria, and the head of Samaria is Remaliah’s son. If ye will not believe, surely ye shall not be established.
verses.verse_html:
9And the head of Ephraim is Samaria, and the head of Samaria is Remaliah’s son. If ye will not believe, surely ye shall not be established. ▼
▼ If…: or, Do ye not believe? it is because ye are not stable

tokens.text: surely ye shall not be established

footnotes.body_text: ▼ If…: or, Do ye not believe? it is because ye are not stable
footnotes.body_html: ▼ If…: or, Do ye not believe? it is because ye are not stable

verses.text_plain: Moreover the Lord spake again unto Ahaz, saying,
verses.verse_html:
10Moreover the Lord spake again unto Ahaz, saying, ▼
▼ Moreover…: Heb. And the Lord added to speak

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Moreover…: Heb. And the Lord added to speak
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Moreover…: Heb. And the Lord added to speak

verses.text_plain: Ask thee a sign of the Lord thy God; ask it either in the depth, or in the height above.
verses.verse_html:
11Ask thee a sign of the Lord thy God; ask it either in the depth, or in the height above. ▼
▼ ask it…: or, make thy petition deep

footnotes.body_text: ▼ ask it…: or, make thy petition deep
footnotes.body_html: ▼ ask it…: or, make thy petition deep

verses.text_plain: But Ahaz said, I will not ask, neither will I tempt the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 12But Ahaz said, I will not ask, neither will I tempt the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And he said, Hear ye now, O house of David; Is it a small thing for you to weary men, but will ye weary my God also?
verses.verse_html: 13And he said, Hear ye now, O house of David; Is it a small thing for you to weary men, but will ye weary my God also?

verses.text_plain: Therefore the Lord himself shall give you a sign; Behold, a virgin shall conceive, and bear a son, and shall call his name Immanuel.
verses.verse_html:
14Therefore the Lord himself shall give you a sign; Behold, a virgin shall conceive, and bear a son, and shall call his name Immanuel. ▼
▼ shall call: or, thou, O virgin, shalt call

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall call: or, thou, O virgin, shalt call
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall call: or, thou, O virgin, shalt call

verses.text_plain: Butter and honey shall he eat, that he may know to refuse the evil, and choose the good.
verses.verse_html: 15Butter and honey shall he eat, that he may know to refuse the evil, and choose the good.

verses.text_plain: For before the child shall know to refuse the evil, and choose the good, the land that thou abhorrest shall be forsaken of both her kings.
verses.verse_html: 16For before the child shall know to refuse the evil, and choose the good, the land that thou abhorrest shall be forsaken of both her kings.

verses.text_plain: The Lord shall bring upon thee, and upon thy people, and upon thy father’s house, days that have not come, from the day that Ephraim departed from Judah; even the king of Assyria.
verses.verse_html: 17The Lord shall bring upon thee, and upon thy people, and upon thy father’s house, days that have not come, from the day that Ephraim departed from Judah; even the king of Assyria.

tokens.text: upon thee, and upon thy people

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the Lord shall hiss for the fly that is in the uttermost part of the rivers of Egypt, and for the bee that is in the land of Assyria.
verses.verse_html: 18And it shall come to pass in that day, that the Lord shall hiss for the fly that is in the uttermost part of the rivers of Egypt, and for the bee that is in the land of Assyria.

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: And they shall come, and shall rest all of them in the desolate valleys, and in the holes of the rocks, and upon all thorns, and upon all bushes.
verses.verse_html:
19And they shall come, and shall rest all of them in the desolate valleys, and in the holes of the rocks, and upon all thorns, and upon all bushes. ▼
▼ bushes: or, commendable trees

tokens.text: all of them in the desolate

footnotes.body_html: ▼ bushes: or, commendable trees

verses.text_plain: In the same day shall the Lord shave with a razor that is hired, namely, by them beyond the river, by the king of Assyria, the head, and the hair of the feet: and it shall also consume the beard.
verses.verse_html: 20In the same day shall the Lord shave with a razor that is hired, namely, by them beyond the river, by the king of Assyria, the head, and the hair of the feet: and it shall also consume the beard.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that a man shall nourish a young cow, and two sheep;
verses.verse_html: 21And it shall come to pass in that day, that a man shall nourish a young cow, and two sheep;

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, for the abundance of milk that they shall give he shall eat butter: for butter and honey shall every one eat that is left in the land.
verses.verse_html:
22And it shall come to pass, for the abundance of milk that they shall give he shall eat butter: for butter and honey shall every one eat that is left in the land. ▼
▼ the land: Heb. the midst of the land

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass, for the abundance

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the land: Heb. the midst of the land
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the land: Heb. the midst of the land

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass in that day, that every place shall be, where there were a thousand vines at a thousand silverlings, it shall even be for briers and thorns.
verses.verse_html: 23And it shall come to pass in that day, that every place shall be, where there were a thousand vines at a thousand silverlings, it shall even be for briers and thorns.

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass in that day
shall be, where there were a thousand

verses.text_plain: With arrows and with bows shall men come thither; because all the land shall become briers and thorns.
verses.verse_html: 24With arrows and with bows shall men come thither; because all the land shall become briers and thorns.

verses.text_plain: And on all hills that shall be digged with the mattock, there shall not come thither the fear of briers and thorns: but it shall be for the sending forth of oxen, and for the treading of lesser cattle.
verses.verse_html: 25And on all hills that shall be digged with the mattock, there shall not come thither the fear of briers and thorns: but it shall be for the sending forth of oxen, and for the treading of lesser cattle.

tokens.text: but it shall be for the sending forth
